name: planegcs
description: A wasm build and a simple wrapper of the FreeCAD PlaneGCS (2D geometric solver)

scripts.build:emsc: docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/planegcs:/src gcs_builder sh -c 'emcmake cmake . -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug && emmake make -j $(nproc)' && cp planegcs/bin/* dist
scripts.build:emsc-release: docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/planegcs:/src gcs_builder sh -c 'emcmake cmake . -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && emmake make -j $(nproc) && ls -lh bin' && cp planegcs/bin/* dist
scripts.build: npm run build:docker && npm run build:emsc
